data: Emil J. Martinec Emil J. Martinec Professor Dept. of Physics, Enrico Fermi Institute, and the College Address: MCP 433 e-martinec@uchicago.edu Website: http://theory.uchicago.edu/~ejm/ Superstring/M-theories; in particular, their geometrical structure and their role in grand unification and the quantization of gravity. Also theories of random surfaces, quantum gravity, black hole physics, and two-dimensional quantum field theory.
